text:
I was out on vacation over the weekend but  I plan to try to wrap up the Dev-Docs feature this week. once it’s done I’ll publish that new version to the Chrome web store right away.

I will make that be a 1.01 version update.

I will create a milestone in the github for 1.02.

Just a stats update:

24 current users
1 uninstallation

Updating that I pushed the update which adds the HubL documentation quick links and the dark theme.

Options page - while it exists in this version will be going away or atleast changing. The options for the dark theme will be rolled into the popup in a non intrusive way.

--according to people online it may take up to 5 hours for the update to roll out to everyone-- you might be able to make it happen faster by going to <chrome://extensions> and hitting update/refresh under developer  settings

nice work!
I think I will find some time this weekend to fix some stuff for the dark theme
